oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Random affine code tree fractals: Hausdorff and affinity dimensions and pressure
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Järvenpää, Esa
Järvenpää, Maarit
Wu, Meng
Wu, Wen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
Mathematics - Classical Analysis and ODEs
37C45, 28A80, 15A45
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove that for random affine code tree fractals the affinity dimension is almost surely equal to the unique zero of the pressure function. As a consequence, we show that the Hausdorff, packing and box counting dimensions of such systems are equal to the zero of the pressure. In particular, we do not presume the validity of the Falconer-Sloan condition or any other additional assumptions which have been essential in all the previously known results.
